column5: Here is the PIC and the story on the Barn  carp-starter  http://www.thebassbarn.com/forum/showthread.php?t=147692
Wow, nice! Can't wait for my trip out east next year to fish for those brutes!
the small ones that i catch here in the ohio river put up a great fight. I cant imagine what that thing would fight like. Great fish. Thanks for posting the pics.
WOW! Must have been a great fight!!!Stripers and peacock bass are definitely on my target list!
